text: Mendim () is a rural locality (a village) in Tashlinsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 204 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Krasnousolsky, 15 km from Tashla. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Mendim
